name: London Photography Tour
description: Are you visiting London for the first time and want to see all the major attractions and get the best London photos you can? Or do you know your way around London, but want some help with your camera and need photography instruction? Hairy Goat is pleased to launch the London Photography Tour. It’s a 4 hour instructional walking photography tour covering the main tourist attractions of London that everyone wants to see and take photos of, such as Trafalgar Square, Houses of Parliament, Westminster Abbey and London Eye.
